articles.description: According to the latest reports from MARCA, Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti wants the club to re-sign former academy prospect Fran Garcia in the summer of 2023. The 23-year-old left-back rose through the youth ranks at Real Madrid and went on to make over…
articles.content:
According to the latest reports from MARCA, Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti wants the club to re-sign former academy prospect Fran Garcia in the summer of 2023.

articles.title: Sixers name squad for Renegades clash - Sydney Sixers
articles.description: The Sydney Sixers have named an unchanged 16-player squad for their clash with the Melbourne Renegades on Wednesday night.
articles.content: The Sixers will be looking to make it three from three at the SCG tomorrow, following back-to-back wins over the Melbourne Stars and Hobart Hurricanes at home.Moises Henriques (52*) produced a true c… [+1522 chars]
